Name: M 117 - Leah Goodridge, City Planning Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE PUBLIC ADVOCATE OF LEAH GOODRIDGE AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY PLANNING COMMISSION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 192 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Public Advocate of Leah Goodridge as a member of the New York City Planning Commission to serve a five-year term that will begin on July 1, 2025 and expire on June 30, 2030.

\b0 By Council Member Powers\par
\par
RESOLVED, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 192 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Public Advocate of Leah Goodridge as a member of the New York City Planning Commission to serve a five-year term that will begin on July 1, 2025 and expire on June 30, 2030.\par
